questions.subject: ComfyUI-WebcamNode
questions.question: How can I run the webcam node?
questions.answer: The webcam node needs to be run at localhost/https.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-WebcamNode
questions.question: Where can I find the webcam node?
questions.answer: The node can be found under Webcam/Webcam Capture.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-WebcamNode
questions.question: How do I start using the webcam?
questions.answer: Press start capture to start using the camera.

questions.subject: ComfyUI-WebcamNode
questions.question: What is the purpose of the auto queue option?
questions.answer: The auto queue option allows you to keep creating images from the webcam input using the seed trick.
